Dị ka onye otu African National Congress, Sibiya bụ onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpaghara (PEC) nke African National Congress Women's League kemgbe afọ 1997.
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu, a họpụtara Sibiya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba South Africa dị ka onye otu African National Congress
A họpụtara ya na Kọmitii Portfolio na ndị uwe ojii. Tupu ntuli aka nke afọ 2014, Sibiya bụ nọmba 35 na ndepụta ANC na KwaZulu-Natal. A họpụtabeghị ya ka ọ laghachi na National Assembly.

Sibiya guzoro dị ka onye omeiwu na onye omeiwu mpaghara na ntuli aka mba na mpaghara nke 2019. A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba ahụ. Kemgbe ọ laghachiri na National Assembly, ọ bụ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology.
Ihe na-amasị Sibiya gụnyere ịbụ abụ, ịkọ ubi na ịgụ akwụkwọ.
